title: Undone: Odette, Elle & me
description: 'Undone' Odette, Elle & me A funny, sexy, sad, insightful story about the search for identity, the search for happiness. Who am I? Odette wants to understand her extreme behavior. She wants to find the 'secret' to happiness. She wants to find the meaning of true love. She's not giving up until she does. Odette swings between extremes, if she’s not giving all her possessions to the poor, she’s working in a brothel. She's either a good mother, or an absent mother. When she hits rock bottom Odette parks a one thousand dollar caravan on the banks of a river and sits there. She’s not moving until she understands her own behavior, and finds the mystery she’s been seeking. Odette finds the 'secret', she finds what she's looking for.Available on Amazon kindle and Paperback
author: Marie Clair
